Narrative Visualization

Calliope-Net: Automatic Generation of Graph Data Facts via Annotated Node-link Diagrams
Graph or network data are widely studied in both data mining and visualization communities to review the relationship among different entities and groups. The data facts derived from graph visual analysis are important to help understand the social structures of complex data, especially for data journalism. However, it is challenging …
Qing Chen, Nan Chen, Wei Shuai, Guande Wu (吴冠德), Zhe Xu, Hanghang Tong, Nan Cao
